website_summaries.verdict: A smart Furby that pairs with the Furby World app for more interactive fun.
pros: Furby will sleep if you put a mask on him
Many adventures available via the easy-to-use app, including the creation of virtual Furblings
The app is not required for enjoyment, however
cons: With active use, this Furby requires lots of battery replacements

customer_reviews.title: Better than the original
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift for my two year old. I remembered having one as a kid and thought it would be so fun to carry on the tradition. This, however, is so much better than mine. The sleep mode is a life saver so you don’t hear any creepy Furbys talking throughout the night. The app you can download to play digitally is fun and interactive. The little guy is kind of gross, but it’s funny. If you pull his tail or shake him, he’ll make a farting sound or vomit. My two year old laughs every time.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Me and my family love it! It's good quality
customer_reviews.text: This furby it's sooo cute! Me and my family love it! It's good quality, the color is so bright and is not plastic or anything like that. But if you want it to do more you gotta download an app for this furby which I'm fine with that. It's fun and my kid uses it everyday! The only thing i dislike is the batteries won't last long but other than that we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Witchy mom

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: As a reward for a great school year, my daughter's one wish was to get a Furby Connect. On its own, the Furby is very cute, soft and entertaining for a seven year old. What is disappointing is that the toy was purchased with the intention of connecting it to the Furby Connect app. Unfortunately we have been unable to connect the Bluetooth with any of our Apple devices. I have researched the issue, which appears to be quite prevalent, and tried all of the suggested fixes. Unfortunately nothing has worked. I'm at my wits end and am about ready to return my daughter's gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen L

customer_reviews.title: Battery eater extreme
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 7 year old. It's so cute when it's on but literally eats through batteries like you wouldn't believe! We bought with a jumbo value pack of high powered batteries and they were gone in 2 days. We switched to rechargeable and need to switch them out every few hours. Not okay! Its very inconvenient and so now it just sits.
customer_reviews.author: Shannan T.

customer_reviews.title: this is a super cute toy
customer_reviews.text: First off, this is a super cute toy. But if you want to annoy the parents - purchase it. It would' shut up. Fortunately it comes with a little mask to cover its eyes to make it go to sleep. My daughter loves the look of it. But my goal has been to keep the mask on as much as possible. But with all of that said, he has a prominent place in my daughter's room because again, it's super cute.
customer_reviews.author: NYmomshopper

customer_reviews.title: Would buy this over and over again!
customer_reviews.text: I love Furbys what can I say. The fur fabric is very soft to touch and it's adorable. Responds well to tickles, hugs, and pets very nicely. A tad bit gross with some of the replies but overall really fun toy. My son hooked it up to the iPad and we hae tons of fun on there with our virtual furbys too. Only draw back I would say is if you don't have rechargable batteries, you are going to spend a lot of money for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: VenusBellona

customer_reviews.title: The product are good but very disapoint with the app
customer_reviews.text: i cant discharge the app....only for some devices. The product are good but very disapoint with the app. LENOVO VIBE K5...dont have the app Huawei P10 LITE....Dont have the app Sony Z3 Compact Tablet....dont have the app Motorola E4 Plus....dont have the app. Finally can use the app on All new Fire tablet (kids edition) but the videos (to furby sing) dont upload. always say : check connection
customer_reviews.author: Diego Ricardo Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: Furby is a Special Friend!
customer_reviews.text: My three grandsons just love Furby (18 months, 4, and 5 years old) unfortunately, I ordered a purple Furby and they sent a magenta pink for my grandson. It was not worth it to make my grandson sad while waiting for me to return the pink/magenta Furby for the purple. Furby has become my grandsons' favorite, almost like a baby brother or a special little friend. They sleep with Furby and spend fun times together laughing, playing games, giggling, and cuddling together.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia J. Berger

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this furby and it wasn’t my favorite because it was annoying and you couldn’t teach it anything. It was sad to see the price drop half the price after I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Kebbz

customer_reviews.title: It's a shame because my daughter really loved it.
customer_reviews.text: We have changed batteried on this toy 5 times already. Even with brand new batteries, it starts but after 30 seconds her eyes shut down and is off. I have asked other friends who have this toy and they complain about the exact same thing. Poorly made toy! It's a shame because my daughter really loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: LITTLE GRAND DAUGHTER NEEDS ONE FOR HERSELF
customer_reviews.text: THIS WILL BE A CHRISTMAS PRESENT FOR MY 18 MONTH OLD GRAND DAUGHTER, MY 8 YEAR OLD GRAND DAUGHTER HAS A PINK ONE SHE GOT LAST YEAR FOR CHRISTMAS. THE 18 MONTH OLD LOVES IT, WILL TALK TO FURBY FOR HOURS, I DECIDED TO GET HER ONE FOR HERSELF, SO MAYBE THE 2 FURBIES WILL TALK TO EACH OTHER
customer_reviews.author: BECKY GORDON

customer_reviews.title: The app is easy to navigate for my kids
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for Christmas. They have really done a lot with this new generation of Furby. The app is easy to navigate for my kids. They still play with them and enjoy the app. I found myself trying it out. These sure aren't the toys we had as a kid. Its cute, and more interactive than I thought it be. Also, it is SO Soft.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's 7th birthday. It's all she's been talking about for the last couple months. Well she LOVED her furby out of the box, but after 1 day it no longer connects to the app and just shuts down after a minute of play time. I've tried resetting it to no avail! I hope we can get a working replacement, my daughter is heartbroken!
customer_reviews.author: 3Feathers

customer_reviews.title: I asked her what she wanted for birthday and she said Nothing so I got her this as a joke and have had a lot of fun sneaking around where she is and turning it on ...
customer_reviews.text: annoys and entertains my wife, I got it for her birthday, I asked her what she wanted for birthday and she said Nothing so I got her this as a joke and have had a lot of fun sneaking around where she is and turning it on and quickly sneak away, yelp and I laugh and then dshe laughs
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey B. Clark

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter loved it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted one of these so bad. Although like most toys and kids she didn't play with it long. The item arrived as described and as promised. Since day one it has and still does work perfectly. I would use this seller again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: AnnMarie Torres

customer_reviews.title: Batteries runs out to quick
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her furby Day Doo. We connected to app. My only issue is the batteries run out quickly. Changed batteries worked for one day then stop working..
customer_reviews.author: Andreu (Dreuski)

customer_reviews.title: One star too many! This stopped working in less ...
customer_reviews.text: One star too many! This stopped working in less than 24 hours out of the box. I tried resetting and changing the batteries and even the tricks ti fix it nothing works. Very frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Andreia

customer_reviews.title: As much as I'd love to hate this thing my daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: As much as I'd love to hate this thing my daughter loves it. It connects well with my galaxy s7, but I couldn't get the app to download on her Galaxy tab (likely a problem with her tablet, not the furby). It does go right to sleep when you apply the sleep mask. Be ready to spend some bucks on batteries, cause it eats them.
customer_reviews.author: Madi*s MOM

customer_reviews.title: Speaker stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Speaker has stopped working. Did not even last a year.
customer_reviews.author: Critical Reader

customer_reviews.title: Worth the batteries
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a 6 year old, very entertaining and of course the app is a hit too. It does take at least 4 batteries a day, I bought rechargeable batteries.
customer_reviews.author: just me

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my 6 year old and interacts great with ...
customer_reviews.text: As a parent itll drive you nuts, perfect for my 6 year old and interacts great with the app. You will go through 4 AA batteries a day, depending on the usage time, which the thing is never off unless the batteries are out or the sleep mask is on. We purchased rechargeable batteries as well and it works out.
customer_reviews.author: Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for nostalgic Millenials
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my bestie. We were kids when the original Furby came out. Brought back lots of fun memories and she loves all the tech advancements.
customer_reviews.author: C. Eldeen

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Got it earlier than expected. Very happy with the purchase. The toy is beautiful and funny to play with.Looks very well made, the colour is nice. As soon as I put the batteries in, the Furby started to talk, sing and move. Downloaded the app and my kid started to play with it right away. My kid is very happy!!!Highly recommended toy !!
customer_reviews.author: Karina G

customer_reviews.title: We've enjoyed playing with him together and have gotten a kick ...
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I gave this to my Goddaughter for her birthday on Friday and it's a big hit! We've enjoyed playing with him together and have gotten a kick out of him. She got a Hatchimal for Easter, but I have to say I like Furby MUCH better!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori / Houston

customer_reviews.title: Toots a lot
customer_reviews.text: He's very glitchy but a really funny and cute toy. Ours seems especially gassy. Gave him four stars because he's narcoleptic.
customer_reviews.author: Tetu

customer_reviews.title: I recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. My daughter has the coral furby and loves it to . As long as you get rechargeable batteries this is the best toy in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Furby fan

customer_reviews.title: Useless product, don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for one day, eyes keep going black after a little play. Doesn't turn back on sometimes, even with new batteries. App crashes everytime the world finally loads. I bet most of these are returns just sent back out for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Charles c mcgowen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy!!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy my daughter this toy but I’m glad I did. I don’t think I’ve ever seen her love a toy as much as she loves this Furby. She takes it everywhere we go. I have to admit myself, it is very cute and funny. And the fact that she can connect it to her iPad and interact with it even more makes it even better.
customer_reviews.author: Amber H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy and Next Edition of Furby
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (11 years of age) adore this toy! She has the previous generation Furby, and saved her allowance to purchase this one. It surely keeps her entertained.
customer_reviews.author: MomMae

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and fun both the 7y and 11y got a kick out of this

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to my little niece.she loves it though.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Woo

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had seen another child with one of these and luckily Amazon had it in stock ! She loves her Furby!

customer_reviews.title: It's a little confusing that a little pink furby sounds like a guy lol
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is SO cute! It's a little confusing that a little pink furby sounds like a guy lol... but it's so cute that we barely mind at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Camp

customer_reviews.title: Although my daughter loved this Furby and it was adored for weeks
customer_reviews.text: Although my daughter loved this Furby and it was adored for weeks. The battery does drain pretty quick comparable to the previous furby. So if you have rechargeable battery's it's the best option for this toy.
customer_reviews.author: gloria thompson

customer_reviews.title: My kids loved furby booms
customer_reviews.text: They're cute. My kids loved furby booms. But they broke in 2 months. So I bought furby connects instead. This time a bigger problem was their hair, which is falling out all over the house. I was confused if I raised a dog or a cat. I missed furby booms....but too easy to break. And I can't buy them in my country any more. I took the furby connects back from my kids and hid them. Sad....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Quite a bit cheaper than the one I got at Kohl's for Christmas, so I took it back and ordered this one. Super cute and fast shipping.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was very disappointed, as she spent her allowance to buy this

customer_reviews.title: Love this little guy
customer_reviews.text: I have the purple one and the teal one, they are so cute! Great toys for kids, collectors, or adults who just like to let their inner kid loose sometimes.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!

customer_reviews.title: App Crashes All the time

customer_reviews.title: amazing price and my child actually plays with it

However, I must stay she played with it only for a week, and then got back to her usual ipad apps. Quite expensive if you see it that way. I hope she will get back to it in a couple of weeks.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it but it uses up the battery ...

customer_reviews.author: Kira Hansen

customer_reviews.title: So glad I didn't drop hundreds on a Hatchimal!!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is fantastic! It brings back memories from my childhood, but had an awesome modern update. I got 2 for both of my kids. The furbys recognize each other and will interact, singing and dancing with each other! The app makes things even more fun with ways to care for and play with the furby. My son is over the moon that they even "poop"! The most annoying part of the "old" furbys was how they would "wake up" and want to play at the worst times.....like the middle of the night. These new guys have a sleep mask and will stay asleep as long as the mask is on! Problem solved! Who needs hatchimals?! These are awesome!

I would really like my money back for it or get it replaced in case I got a lemon. Unfortunately my kids LOVE this thing so I would really like to get it working properly however, it should not last for merely 4 days, that's ridiculous. Yes I know rechargeable batteries, but why buy those when this should last a few months AT LEAST!

customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves it. I like that this furby has a Sleep mode so it's not waking and talking every time it's moved like the furby boom does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Hasbro Furby Connect Friend, Purple
product_meta.description: Get ready to discover a world of surprises with this Furby Connect friend and the Furby Connect World app (see app details below). This Furby Connect friend has a light-up antenna that glows when there's something new to discover in the app -- including music and videos! This Furby Connect friend has lots to say! Even when Furby speaks in Furbish, it's not hard to figure out what Furby means. This Furby Connect friend has colorful eyes that display more than 150 animations to help express what Furby wants. Interact with a Furby Connect friend by petting, tickling, or shaking Furby, turning Furby upside down, or even moving its antenna like a joystick -- then see how Furby reacts! When this Furby Connect friend syncs with the Furby Connect World app, there are more physical and digital ways to interact and more surprises to discover. Does Furby need some beauty sleep? This Furby Connect friend comes with a sleep mask. Just put the sleep mask on, and it's good night Furby! To wake Furby up, remove the sleep mask -- Furby will be bright-eyed and bushy-tailed for more fun! Get the Furby Connect World app to explore a world of surprises with a Furby Connect friend. Watch videos together, feed Furby with the app, and raise virtual Furblings in the app. The Furby Connect friend gets updates and new content by connecting to the app! Furby and all related properties are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Explore the Furby Connect World app and discover surprises together
The Furby Connect friend gets updates with the app and learns new phrases
This Furby friend expresses with more than 150 colorful eye animations
Make Furby sleep just by putting the included sleep mask on
Includes 1 Furby Connect friend, sleep mask, and instructions
NOTE: Refer the Instructional Video from the image section before use which is highly essential.
